title: Lead ions (Pb2+) Electrochemical Sensors Based on Novel Schiff Base Ligands
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00485J, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Zahra Akbari, Khouloud Abid, Daniela Iannazzo, Morteza Montazerozohori, Enza Fazio, Fortunato Neri, Carmelo Corsaro, Giovanni Neri
In this study, two novel bidentate Schiff base ligands, namely the (1 E,1'E,2E,2'E)-N,N'-(butane-1,4-diyl)bis(3-(2-methoxyphenyl)prop-2-en-1-imine) (L1) and the tetradentate Schiff base ligand namely N1,N2-bis(2-(((1E,2E)-3-(4-(dimethylamino)phenyl)allylidene)amino)ethyl)ethane-1,2-diamine (L2), were successfully synthesized through a simple procedure....
